snippet: While he served time in Huntsville, Tex., Brian Price cooked special last meals for 218 prisoners on death row. He opposes the state’s decision to end the custom.
lead_paragraph: While he served time in Huntsville, Tex., Brian Price cooked special last meals for 218 prisoners on death row. He opposes the state’s decision to end the custom.

headline.main: Ex-Inmate Shares Stories of Stint as a Death Row Chef
headline.print_headline: Ex-Inmate Shares Stories of Stint as a Death Row Chef
headline.seo: Former Inmate Shares Tricks of the Trade of a Death Row Chef
